item.description:
The CAPE Group will be holding a night shoot in Boston/Cambridge on Monday, October 5, 2009 at 6p.m. Lucky for us it will also be a full moon that night! We'll take advantage of the colors from the setting sun to shoot rowers, sailboats, city skyline and stay to shoot the full moon and cityscape.

We'll shoot at this location for a while, so even if you can't make it right at 6p.m. still plan to join us! We may move around a bit later on so please let me know if you think you'll arrive late.

After the shoot we'll meet at a nearby restaurant for a bite to eat. Please RSVP early so I can let the restaurant know to expect us.

This is going to be a great shoot, looking forward to seeing you all there!

Special note: If you attend this event your name will be entered into a drawing for one of the following O'Reilly books:

Adobe Photoshop CS4 One-on-One
Photoshop Lightroom 2 Adventure
Light & Exposure for Digital Photographers


Suggestions for what to bring to this shoot:

Tripod
Wide Angle Lens (if you have one!)
Shutter Release
Jacket









For the shoot we'll meet on Memorial Drive at the Harvard building/river side. If you know where the Microsoft building is (1 Memorial Drive) it's just down the road from there on the river side. There is parking along Memorial Drive, which is pretty easy during the week, but you might want to allow extra time on the weekend.

Please click HERE for directions.
item.name: Boston Night Cityscape and Full Moon Shoot
